title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" popup action is incorrectly enabled even when a manual build is not necessary because the build is already done automatically.
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled even when a manual build is not necessary.
EB: The "Build" popup action should only be enabled when a manual build is necessary.
SR: Update the condition for enabling the "Build" popup action to consider if a manual build is necessary.
